mapper.sql: ID, TYPEID, TEMPLATEID,TYPENAME,TEMPLATENAME, TITLE, VIEWNUM, COMMENTNUM, ISHOT, CREATOR, UPDATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, ISDEL
mapper.select:
select
,
from NEWS_DETAIL where ISDEL = 0
and instr(TITLE,#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(TYPENAME,#{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(TEMPLATENAME,#{templatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and ISHOT= #{ishot,jdbcType=CHAR}
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(#{startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= to_char(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD')
order by CREATETIME DESC
mapper.update: update NEWS_DETAIL set ISDEL = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into NEWS_DETAIL (ID, TYPEID, TEMPLATEID, TYPENAME,TEMPLATENAME, TITLE, VIEWNUM, COMMENTNUM, ISHOT, CREATOR, UPDATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, ISDEL, CONTENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commentnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ishot,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB})

TYPEID,

TEMPLATENAME,

mapper.update:
update NEWS_DETAIL
TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATEID = #{templateid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPENAME = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATENAME = #{templatename,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIEWNUM = #{viewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMENTNUM = #{commentnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISHOT = #{ishot,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update NEWS_DETAIL set TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATEID = #{templateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPENAME = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATENAME = #{templatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEWNUM = #{viewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMENTNUM = #{commentnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISHOT = #{ishot,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
